short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieve your LinkedIn li_at cookie and user agent information easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Foxes.ai Helper is a user-friendly tool designed to make it easier for you to access your own LinkedIn-related browser information. This extension simplifies the process of retrieving your user agent and LinkedIn cookie data, without requiring any technical knowledge or use of browser developer tools.

Key Features:
- One-click retrieval of your browser's user agent
- Easy access to your LinkedIn cookie information
- Simple, intuitive interface for non-technical users

This extension is perfect for individuals who need to provide their browser information for LinkedIn-related applications or services, but find the process of using browser inspector tools challenging or time-consuming.

Privacy and Security:
- Your data stays on your device - we do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal information.
- The extension only accesses the specific data you request, when you request it.
- All operations are performed locally within your browser.

How to use:
1. Click the Foxes.ai Helper icon in your toolbar
2. Press the "Refresh Data" button
3. Your user agent and LinkedIn cookie information will be displayed
4. Use the "Copy" buttons to easily transfer the information as needed

Foxes.ai Helper is designed with simplicity and user empowerment in mind, giving you easy access to your own browser data without any technical hurdles.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to LinkedIn in any way. It is an independent tool designed to help users access their own browser information more easily.
